rules.name: Unlimited Approval
rules.recommendation: Use SafeApprove to set temporary allowances instead of unlimited approval

rules.name: Unverified Contract
rules.description: Contract source code is not verified on BSCScan
rules.recommendation: Verify contract source code before interacting. Unverified contracts cannot be audited.

rules.name: New Contract with Low Activity
rules.description: Contract is recently deployed with minimal transactions
rules.recommendation: Exercise caution with new contracts. Wait for more activity and community validation.

rules.name: Very Few Holders
rules.description: Token has less than 50 unique holders
rules.recommendation: Low holder count indicates limited adoption. Could be early stage or a scam.

rules.name: Low Liquidity
rules.description: Token has insufficient liquidity on DEX (< $10k)
rules.recommendation: Low liquidity leads to high slippage and difficulty selling. Avoid or use very small amounts.

rules.name: Honeypot Bytecode Pattern
rules.description: Contract bytecode contains suspicious honeypot patterns
rules.recommendation: AVOID this token. Honeypot patterns indicate you won't be able to sell after buying.

low.description: Token appears relatively safe with minimal risk factors

medium.description: Token shows some concerning patterns. Exercise caution.

high.description: Token exhibits dangerous patterns. High risk of scam or loss.

criticalCombinations.warning: This combination is extremely dangerous and could result in wallet drainage.
